definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: A mother's love is like a pastoral poem, you are far from pure, and elegant light.
sentences.chinese: 母爱就象一首田园诗，幽远纯净，和雅清淡。

sentences.english: He speaks of them as a mother would of her children.
sentences.chinese: 他是怀着一种母爱想着他们。

sentences.english: ConclusionGestational stress can impact the maternal care, and oxytocin can protect these behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 结论怀孕后期持续应激能够明显损伤母鼠的母爱行为。

sentences.english: I had heard their song "Truly Love You, " which commends motherly love.
sentences.chinese: 我已经听到了他们的歌曲“真的爱你”的赞扬母爱。

sentences.english: But it remains part and parcel of modern mother love.
sentences.chinese: 但是这些是现代母爱的不可或缺的一部分。

sentences.english: I felt, well-being of mother love.
sentences.chinese: 我感受到了，母爱的幸福。

sentences.english: Strength of a mother's love can be propelled to the extent to raise up a car supressed upon her own kid.
sentences.chinese: 母爱的力量可以大到举起压在爱子身上的小轿车。

sentences.english: I felt well-being of mother love.
By doing so, she proves that her love for her children is stronger than all her fears.
sentences.chinese: 通过这些做法，她证明了母爱可以战胜一切恐惧。

sentences.english: Hers is a true example of the strength of a mother's love.
sentences.chinese: 她所做的一切正是展现母爱力量最真实的例子了。

sentences.english: Up to now, the local people still respect mother love of antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 至今，当地人民还保留着敬母爱母的古风。

sentences.english: Moth nodded, filled with its mother's love, at least for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 莫丝点点头，心里充满了母爱，至少这次是。

sentences.english: Today we will tell you a story named "a mother's love outlasts everything".
sentences.chinese: 今天我要给大家讲一个故事，叫做“永恒母爱”。

sentences.english: It is interesting to note, too, that maternal love is not only both unique and universal but also paradoxical.
sentences.chinese: 更有趣的，母爱又像独特又像平凡，全然似非而是。

sentences.english: Now, she is still continued to service for the children well.
sentences.chinese: 现在，仍然秉持着“童心母爱”继续为孩子们服务。

sentences.english: For Seymour, the saga of motherly love was anything but.
sentences.chinese: 对于西摩来说，这是一个讲述母爱的传奇故事。

definition: lit. the cow licking its calf fondly (idiom)/fig. to show deep affection towards one's children
to show concern and care for
affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children
to be fondly attached to/to not wish to part with/to cling to
to have tender affection for/to love tenderly/to pamper sb
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
